sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The US, UK and Australian premiers announce a new defence plan for Asia-Pacific, complete with nuclear-powered submarines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Facing 25 years in prison, the trial begins for the latest Russian opposition activist to face charges over speaking out against the Kremlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Rubbish piles up in the streets of Paris as bin collectors reject a bill in the French Parliament which could change the retirement age.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: A town in Belgium is experiencing a living nightmare due to contamination from so-called forever chemicals from a nearby plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Australia is to buy as many as five nuclear-powered submarines,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: then build a new model with US and British technology.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's an ambitious plan to bulk up Western muscle across the Asia-Pacific in the face of a rising China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's all part of the recently formed alliance between the UK, the US and Australia, known as AUKUS. Their leaders met in San Diego to unveil their plans. At the subsequent press conference President Biden was keen to make one point clear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: These subs are powered, not nuclear armed subs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Nuclear power, not nuclear armed. Australia is a proud non-nuclear weapon state that is committed to stay that way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: For the first time ever, it will be three fleets of submarines working together across both the Atlantic and Pacific, keeping our oceans free, open and prosperous for decades to come. The scale, complexity and economic significance of this investment is akin to the creation of the Australian automotive industry in the post-World War II period.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Under the deal, Australian Navy personnel will be embedded at US and UK submarine bases to gain the necessary skills to use the submarines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: From 2027, the US and UK will base a small number of nuclear subs at a base in Perth, Western Australia, before Canberra buys the first three American Virginia-class submarines in the early 2030s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The trial has begun in Moscow of the latest Russian opposition activists to face charges

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: over speaking out against the Kremlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Karamurza is accused of treason for spreading what prosecutors claim was fake news about the Russian army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: He faces 25 years in jail. It is obvious that the authorities decided to hold a court hearing on Karamurza in a cosmic pace, as soon as possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The next hearing will be on Thursday, on the 16th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And there is no doubt about the final verdict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last night, at the European Parliament, a prominent liberal MEP spoke out against Moscow's treatment of Karamurza and other Kremlin opponents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: I think that this Parliament during this session has to stand by them and to put back on the table the liberation of Alexei Navalny and with them of all political prisoners.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: As Russia's Vladimir Kara-Murza was in prison. Alexei Gorinov and many others arrested for speaking out against the war in Ukraine. Karamurza is a Western-educated activist who was a close associate of the assassinated opposition leader Boris Nemtsov. He's among several critics of Vladimir Putin to have been detained since Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Not bad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Putin to have been detained since Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Times are tough in Moldova, a country battling an energy crisis and recurrent protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But the nation is not on the cusp of a military conflict, that's according to the Moldovan defense minister. Authorities suspect that ongoing anti-government protests are being stirred up by Russia. Autoritatea suspecă că protesturile anti-government au fost încălzite de Rusia. pe care Federația Rusă încearcă să le exerceze cu scopul de schimbarea ordinii politice, de destabilizare a situației și de răsturnarea puterii.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: În februarie, președintele Moldova a fost în Munich, împreună cu secretarul general NATO, unde a apărut să se opreze la unul dintre alianțele.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Este, în primul rând, și o întrebare politică, asupra cărora sunt foarte multe discuții.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pentru noi este principal să ave to have a cooperation with NATO, which we have proposed and together with colleagues we have succeeded in the last year to deepen this cooperation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Moldova is one of the poorest countries in Europe and conditions have only gotten worse since Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine. The EU has provided aid, but dissatisfaction has been growing, especially in the breakaway region of Transnistria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: European financial chiefs are seeking to reassure investors that there's little risk posed to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: European banks by the collapse of the Silicon Valley bank in the US.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: It was shut down last week as depositors rushed to withdraw funds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: With memories of the 2008 banking crisis still fresh, the EU's economy commissioner said European institutions were in a stronger position. All European banks, not only the biggest, the bigger, are applying the prudential Basel standard. So directly there is no contagion. The possibility of indirect impact is something that we have to monitor, but at the moment we don't see it as a significant risk. The White House has intervened to dampen fears of a knock-on effect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Biden said regulations would be tightened and taxpayers protected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: I'm going to ask Congress and the banking regulators to strengthen the rules for banks to make it less likely this kind of bank failure would happen again and to protect American jobs and small businesses despite the reassurances markets remain nervous on both sides of the Atlantic particularly after the failure of another US bank over the weekend so far the crisis has been contained but authorities are keeping a close eye on developments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Waste collectors in France have been on strike for a week, standing up against proposed pension reforms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Rubbish is piling up in the streets, and tourists visiting the City of Light are starting to notice the smell. I find the smell very unpleasant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: When you pass in front of it, you have to step on it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: We passed by streets where you really had to do slalom between the trash cans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: It's not very nice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: We're having a lot of strikes in England as well, and even though it does spoil a lot of the view and the smell, I do support the strikes. Retirement and pay is important to a lot of people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Of course Paris without the trash would be much prettier and more elegant, but we also understand the life, the economy, the social conflicts, the misunderstandings, etc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The pension reform bill is in its final stages in the French Parliament, and there could be a decision this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: But in several cities in France, workers would prefer to throw the reform out with their rubbish.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thousands of travellers were left stranded in airports across Germany after strike action led to hundreds of flights being cancelled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The industrial action at Berlin, Hamburg and Hanover is the latest stoppage by airport staff in a long-running dispute over pay.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Unions are seeking a 10.5% salary increase for security and ground crews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Management have so far offered just 5%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Further talks will take place on March the 27th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's a reputation that this small Belgian town would like to do without.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Zweindrecht, located near the Flemish city of Antwerp, is one of Europe's hotspots for areas contaminated with PFAS chemicals, otherwise known as forever chemicals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They're notorious for their indestructible nature and extremely slow degradation rates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: For local residents, the contamination by the nearby 3M factory has turned their lives into a living nightmare.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: They've been advised to stop eating the fruit, veg and eggs produced there. But this caution goes beyond just food.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: We are asked not to work with bare hands on the ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We have to work with gloves on the ground, just like we do with our wives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: We are also asked to be careful with the children, to play in the grass, not to overdo it, to climb in the trees, to be careful. In the end, we can't do anything. Vincent no longer sells his eggs, but he doesn't want to sacrifice his 300 fruit trees and three vegetable gardens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: This is despite the fact that PFAS chemicals, which are found in water and soil, can increase the risk of cancer and thyroid disease.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They can also lead to a reduced immune response to vaccines in children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: For residents of the town, this invisible threat isn't going away anytime soon, which for many is a worrying thought. But other people who have a beautiful garden say, listen, I'm not going out in my garden anymore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I'm not going out at all, at all, at all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: There are people who have had a burn-out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: There are people who have already had a few suicides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: There has not been a case of suicide, let's be honest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But there are people who are really scared.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: PFAS chemicals are used in the textile car and electronics industries, including for non-stick coatings on stoves, firefighting foams and rainwear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: For Toon Pennen, another resident of Zwijndrecht, there's no doubt in his mind as to who's responsible for the contamination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The site of 3M is indeed the biggest polluted, I think even in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The American group reached an agreement last year with the Flemish government for 571 million euros in favour of local residents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It's the same like the concentrations in the bloods of the people of Zwennrecht.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It's also the highest the scientists ever seen in a human being.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Contacted by Euronews, 3M explains that it will work to discontinue the use of PFAS chemicals across its product portfolio by the end of 2025, adding that it does not change its longstanding position and that the company continues to act responsibly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: change its long-standing position and that the company continues to act responsibly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The American group reached an agreement last year with the Flemish government for 571 million euros in favor of local residents.
